ygData.subject: Re: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as it goes the person that is 27 with skill of 65 that shows that the math of (level-15) *5 is wrong, and if there still is a  cap which I hope there
ygData.messageBody:
As far as it goes the person that is 27 with skill of 65 that shows that
the math of (level-15) *5 is wrong, and if there still is a cap which I
hope there isn't then, the only one that is stated other then the one
metioned was diabloklr and it was (level *5) - 13 which is the only opther
one metioned. I think it may be it but I also disagre with the formuala . I
can think of no other formuala in the game that uses this, and the math does
seem consistant but we will see. But I agree with Diabloklr on one thing it
is at least not (level-15) *5. Hey guys this is a thread on Tinkering lets
figure out what this is and see what we can come up with this. Thanks :)

Fanrick Mage to Brell

-----Original Message-----
From: Diablokilr@... [mailto:Diablokilr@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 16, 1999 2:25 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: SV: [EQ_Tinkering] Re: Skill Cap


From: Diablokilr@...

The funny thing about this response was that it was meant for the other guy
who says my formula is incorrect.... according to my formula he had yet to
reach the limit of his skill so kiss off Thank you.
